mapper.insert: insert into ZOOBENTHOS_MI (ID, SERIAL_NUMBER, RIVER, SECTION_ID, SAMPLING_POINT, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, MONITOR_TIME, MEASURE_LINE, WATER_DEPTH, PHYLUM, GENUS, SPECIES_NAME, DENSITY, BIOMASS, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serialNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{river,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{samplingPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{monitorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{measureLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waterDepth,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{phylum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{genus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speciesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{density,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{biomass,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update ZOOBENTHOS_MI set SERIAL_NUMBER = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, RIVER = #{river,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECTION_ID = #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMPLING_POINT = #{samplingPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LONGITUDE = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LATITUDE = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, MONITOR_TIME = #{monitorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MEASURE_LINE = #{measureLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WATER_DEPTH = #{waterDepth,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, PHYLUM = #{phylum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GENUS = #{genus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPECIES_NAME = #{speciesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DENSITY = #{density,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, BIOMASS = #{biomass,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, SERIAL_NUMBER, RIVER, SECTION_ID, SAMPLING_POINT, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, MONITOR_TIME, MEASURE_LINE, WATER_DEPTH, PHYLUM, GENUS, SPECIES_NAME, DENSITY, BIOMASS, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from ZOOBENTHOS_MI where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, SERIAL_NUMBER, RIVER, SECTION_ID, SAMPLING_POINT, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, MONITOR_TIME, MEASURE_LINE, WATER_DEPTH, PHYLUM, GENUS, SPECIES_NAME, DENSITY, BIOMASS, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from ZOOBENTHOS_MI
